p: GS, GB, VL, and MN conceived and designed the study. GS, MO, JB, RC, and BL collected the samples and performed the HIV sequence amplification and genotyping. GB and IA performed the phylogenetic and phylodynamics inferences. MN performed the statistical analyses. GS, GB, IA, and VL wrote the manuscript. All authors analyzed the data and discussed and reviewed the manuscript.
